learn:
This section is where you’ll organize and define your releases as well as add all the digital files that you’ll be using in your elements.

Once you've added a release or file you can also generate download codes for it.

Note: if you’re adding an album file you can also add cover art, photos, liner notes, even videos in the ZIP file.

copy.firstuse: CASH Assets are places to keep releases & files you’ll need for your Campaigns. Before you can begin adding Assets you will need to connect to one of the 3rd-party storage platforms below.
